text: Hyundai Kona (Korean: ) is a subcompact crossover SUV produced by Hyundai. It was showed the first generation Kona for the first time on June 2017. It was globally launched when second generation Kona came out. == Naming == The car was sold in Portugal called Hyundai Kauai, as Kona is looks like to Cona. it is also sold on Iceland, Kona means women in Icelandic. The car was sold in China called Hyundai Encino. == Reviews == The Independent review the Kona, it has good reviews such as more comfortable, more space and value, the rating was 8/10. === Hyundai Kona Electric 2024 === Wired review the Hyundai Kona Electric 2024, it has good reviews such as smooth ride and very nice design, it has a bad reviews such as CarPlay activation is hard to understand and too many noises and system that are easily affected. == References == == Other websites == * Kona Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Hyundai Kona
